title: Signing of Plans - All the plans shall be signed by the owner and the licensed surveyor/engineer/structural engineer/supervisor or architect or any Professional on Record as the case may be, and shall indicate their names in block capital letters, addresses and license numbers when so licensed, allotted by the Commissioner
clause_text: Signing of Plans - All the plans shall be signed by the owner and the licensed surveyor/engineer/structural engineer/supervisor or architect or any Professional on Record as the case may be, and shall indicate their names in block capital letters, addresses and license numbers when so licensed, allotted by the Commissioner. The list of Professionals on Record is as per Annexure 10.
section: Signing of plans by owners and licensed personnel/architect:
